attributes.action: introduce legislation that will make company directors personally liable for health and safety breaches
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In cases where a firm or organisation is convicted of breaches of health and safety law, the new legislation will permit the judge to direct a proportion of the fine to come directly out of the pockets of the directors.
Further, the new legislation will make any kind of insurance or indemnity against this new liability illegal.

By such means, company directors will be forced to care for their employees at the same level as their own pay packets.
